title: Favorite Skin Sets
body: I was just curious as to what everyone's favorite skin sets were. I personally believe that the Arcade/Boss skins were the best. The epic iconic arcade visuals and the Bit Rush song that released with the set really drew me in. And I mean REALLY drew me in. Any other opinions?

replies.body: +1 for Arcade! Arcade Sona is my all-time favorite skin! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=W3cwzZgU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-04T21:52:48.160+0000)
>
> +1 for Arcade! Arcade Sona is my all-time favorite skin! ^-^

Veigar and Riven are my favorite of the bunch. The effects are fantastic! Well done to whoever came up with the idea in general though. I'm so happy that my Surprise Party Fiddlesticks skin snowballed into the Final Boss Veigar skin in December or else I probably wouldn't even know the skins existed.
Pentakill or Bloodmoon.^^
i agree with the blood moon, so beautiful!

Blood Moon, no doubt.

Also I like Cosmic Reaver theme so much, so I hope we see Cosmic Reaver Xerath and Syndra in the future. Hear my words, Rito.

Blood moon really spoke to me, really after bm elise came,  and I like the "story" that come with it that each skins (except maybe Shen and akali for now) of how that is the ionian view of a champ hoping to see bm kindred this yea. I want to see what they do with bloodstone taric so she how they tie the skin line together.

> [{quoted}](name=LaoBushido,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=W3cwzZgU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-04T22:00:14.084+0000)
>
> Blood moon really spoke to me, really after bm elise came,  and I like the "story" that come with it that each skins (except maybe Shen and akali for now) of how that is the ionian view of a champ hoping to see bm kindred this yea. I want to see what they do with bloodstone taric so she how they tie the skin line together.

Bloodstone is a "line" because Lissandra has a Bloodstone skin as well.
I know, that's what I said my statement was wonder what direction the skin will change bs taRic into

> [{quoted}](name=LaoBushido,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=W3cwzZgU,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-02-05T06:21:47.811+0000)
>
> I know, that's what I said my statement was wonder what direction the skin will change bs taRic into

I misunderstood the first time and misunderstood again. 

Do you mean "how his rework will make his Bloodstone skin look like" or "what champions will be getting future Bloodstone skins?" Or neither of those?
Yea the first question,

> [{quoted}](name=LaoBushido,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=W3cwzZgU,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-05T10:57:13.764+0000)
>
> Yea the first question,

Hopefully they fix his hair for that skin in the update. In the splash for BS Taric, he has long, wavy and stylish hair. In game his hair goes into a pompadour / hair metal band hairstyle that is just truly unfitting.

1st really nice thread idea ^^

my fav. BM *.*  OMG none of them looks bad i love them and even the outdated ones like akali .. imo BM akali got the BEST splash in the game it's a beautiful piece of art i just love looking at it.

what don't you add a poll to your Discussion would be nice ^_^

Project is my favourite line!

But all time favourite skin is Aether Wing Kayle.

Headhunter series.
{{champion:84}} {{champion:51}} Look awesome.
Take a guess what mine is :)
Eternum is the best and most badass skin set by far. I might be biased given my undying devotion to Rek'Sai.
Battlecast or maybe Gentalmen (Cho'gath and Gnar)... aww who am I kidding battlecast wins by so much it ain't even funny.
Even though there are only two skins thus far, i'm in love with the elderwood series. :) {{champion:432}} {{champion:120}}
Temple skins they need to add more rite now its temple jax only.

I'd like Ravenborn and Death Blossom to be a skin set as well as Shadowfire (Maybe that could even be Diana's fire themed skin! or maybe not)

Existing skin set? It would probably be the Fire themed ones: Foxfire Ahri, Phoenix Quinn, and Wildfire Zyra :)

Also the Snow Day and Christmas themed ones: Snow Day Syndra, Slaybelle Katarina and Mistletoe LeBlanc :)
The disguise ones; Big Bad Warwick, Definitely Not Biltzcrank and Udyr.
If only maid or star guardian were sets...
